title: kandha bhaktha
sahitya:
kandA bhakta cintAmaNi en cintAkulamiDip-piNi tIrttaruL nI



anupallavi



santAnam candanam pArijAtam mandAram karpakam nEr udAram



caraNam



arumai ariyA mAndar tam pAl alaindalaindu nAn EmAndEn tiriyAmalE
dharmavati umaiyAl tanda maindA santam mighunda kavi kunjaradAsan kuraigaL
shinda
